reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 660/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - CITY OF BRANTFORD
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY — CITY OF BRANTFORD
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 660/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - CITY OF BRANTFORD
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The authority of the Minister under the following provisions is delegated to the council of the City of Brantford, with respect to all applications made on or after December 26, 1998 for land in the City of Brantford:  1. Subsection 50 (18) of the Act, to give approvals. 2. Section 51 of the Act, to approve a plan of subdivision. 3. Sections 50 and 53 of the Act, to give consents. 4. Section 57 of the Act, to issue a certificate of validation. 5. Section 50 of the Condominium Act, to approve or exempt a condominium description. O. Reg. 660/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The authority of the Minister under the following provisions is delegated to the council of the City of Brantford, with respect to all applications made on or after December 26, 1998 for land in the City of Brantford:

1. Subsection 50 (18) of the Act, to give approvals.

2. Section 51 of the Act, to approve a plan of subdivision.

3. Sections 50 and 53 of the Act, to give consents.

4. Section 57 of the Act, to issue a certificate of validation.

5. Section 50 of the Condominium Act, to approve or exempt a condominium description. O. Reg. 660/98, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 660/98, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 660/98, s. 2.
